name: Llamajesus
description:
The floods have come! Llamajesus will save as many precious llama souls as possible. Once you have all the llamas that need saving, take them to llama heaven where llama god will judge them.... and you.

Controls

WASD Movement

Space: Toggle Hover Mode Once in Air

Mouse Button: Spit . . . . 

Backspace: Restart Level

Esc: Quit
